archimate:BusinessProcess.name: MAN.3.BP4 Define, monitor and adjust project activities
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Define, monitor and adjust project activities and their dependencies according to defined project life cycle and estimations. Adjust activities and their dependencies as required. NOTE 2: A structure and a manageable size of the activities and related work packages support an adequate progress monitoring. NOTE 3: Project activities typically cover engineering, management and supporting processes.
